metadata.title: CVE-2018-7032 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: webcheckout in myrepos through 1.20171231 does not sanitize URLs that arepassed to git clone, allowing a malicious website operator or a MitMattacker to take advantage of it for arbitrary code execution, asdemonstrated by an "ext::sh -c" attack or an option injection attack.

criterions.comment: myrepos: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
